SEARCH

Class VendingModel

java.lang.Object
VendingModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
SpecialVendingModel
public class VendingModel extends Object
This represents a vending model of the vending machine. It contains an arraylist of the Slot class it also contains an array of integers DENOMINATION as the values of the bills it also contains an array of integers available changes as the number of bills for each denomination the vending machine has

    • change

      public int change(int amount, int cost)
      This method uses the money given and the price of the item to return the change of the customer.
      Parameters:

      cost - cost of the item being bought
      Returns:
      the change with respect to the machines ability to give change
